Entity.Description: Stores the reason for inventory adjustment.
Entity.Name: Adjustment_Reason

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_ADJUSTMENT_REASON table.
Attribute.Name: Adjustment_Reason_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this adjustment reason.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The reason for the inventory transaction. This field is typically populated when the user does an inventory adjustment. Inventory bins, which will be used to adjust inventory (for inventory synchronization) on the host systems, will be tied to this reason code. This can be associated to a sequence of loations in YFS_Adjustment_Locn_Seq entity. During inventory adjustments if the location to be adjusted is not known, these associated locations associated are used to deduct inventory.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The description of the adjustment status.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the accounting bin location. This, in conjunction with NODE_KEY, identifies a unique location in the node.
Attribute.Name: Accounting_Bin_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag implies that the adjustment reason usually results in increment. Valid Value: Y/N. Default Value: Y.
Attribute.Name: Imply_Increment

Attribute.Description: This flag implies that the adjustment reason usually results in decrement. Valid Value: Y/N. Default Value: Y.
Attribute.Name: Imply_Decrement

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Stores the reason for inventory adjustment.
Entity.Name: Adjustment_Reason_Detail

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_ADJUSTMENT_REASON_DTL table.
Attribute.Name: Adjustment_Reason_Detail_Key

Attribute.Description: The adjustment reason key that is associated with this adjustment reason detail.
Attribute.Name: Adjustment_Reason_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_SHIP_NODE table.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The code of the inventory organization to which the reason code is associated.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The reason for the inventory transaction. This field is typically populated when the user does an inventory adjustment. Inventory bins, which will be used to adjust inventory (for inventory synchronization) on the host systems, will be tied to this reason code.
Attribute.Name: Host_Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the zone or location sequence for inventory adjustments. During inventory adjustments, these locations or zones are considered in the order of sequence. If zones are configured in the adjustment sequence, locations within the zone are considered in the order of pick sequence and location id. Inventory is deducted from non-virtual locations till a virtual location is reached, and the rest of the inventory is deducted from that location. The inventory adjustment is such that only the virtual location configured in the adjustment sequence goes negative.
Entity.Name: Adjustment_Location_Sequence

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_ADJUSTMENT_LOCN_SEQ table.
Attribute.Name: Adjustment_Location_Sequence_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_ADJUSTMENT_REASON table.
Attribute.Name: Adjustment_Reason_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_ZONE table.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_LOCATION table.
Attribute.Name: Location_Key

Attribute.Description: Sequence in which the location or zone has to be considered while adjusting inventory.
Attribute.Name: Sequence

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: Defines the status in which inventory is sub-classified once it is received in the warehouse. For example, product class is a classification of inventory that the product comes with, when it arrives at the warehouse. Typical values are First Quality and Second Quality. Due to additional inventory processes within the warehouse, it is required to further classify inventory. Typical inventory status values are Normal, Awaiting Inventory Check, Inventory Held etc. The way this inventory attribute impacts business process is that inventory availability picture projected to external systems will be based on the inventory status it is in. The inventory picture is projected through the supply type attribute associated with inventory status. For example, the supply available for allocating against orders would be the one with inventory status Normal, and not Awaiting Inventory Check or Inventory Held etc.
Entity.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_INVENTORY_STATUS table.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status_Key

Attribute.Description: The node to which the location belongs.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The status in which inventory is sub-classified once it is received in the warehouse. For example, product class is a classification of inventory that the product comes with when it arrives at the warehouse. Typical values of product class are First Quality and Second Quality. Due to additional inventory processes within the warehouse, it is required to further classify inventory. Typical inventory status values are Normal, Awaiting Inventory Check, Inventory Held, etc.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: The description of the inventory status.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether inventory belonging to an inventory status can be used for a specific operation. The inventory availability picture projected to external systems will be based on the inventory status it is in. The inventory picture is projected through the supply type attribute associated with inventory status. For example, the supply available for allocating against orders would be the one with inventory status Normal, and not Awaiting Inventory Check or Inventory Held etc.
Attribute.Name: Supply_Type

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: To support automatic change of inventory status and therefore the supplies associated with it, zones have an inventory status transition matrix associated with them. What this implies is that as a result of an operation if inventory is moved to a specific zone, inventory status would automatically change and as a result the supply picture would change automatically. For example, let's consider Inventory in status Awaiting QC check in the QC area. Once the inventory check is done and the product moved to a zone where put away of QC okay products are typically stored, then the inventory status changes from Awaiting QC to Normal.
Entity.Name: Inventory_Status_Tran

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_INVENTORY_STATUS_TRAN table.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status_Tran_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the zone.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated the location.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The inventory status of the product being put away to this zone.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: The new inventory status acquired by a product upon moving to a zone. Inventory will be status Awaiting QC check in the QC area. Once the inventory check is done and the product moved to a zone where put away of QC okay products are typically stored, then the inventory status changes from Awaiting QC to Normal.
Attribute.Name: New_Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Details of license-plated inventory are stored here.
Entity.Name: LPN_Dtl

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LPN_DTL table.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Dtl_Key

Attribute.Description: The LPN number that is associated with this LPN detail.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The outer most LPN number that is associated with this LPN detail.
Attribute.Name: Outer_Most_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The inventory item key that is associated with this LPN detail.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: The inventory tag key that is associated with this LPN detail.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: The status in which inventory is sub-classified once it is received in the warehouse. For example, product class is a classification of inventory that the product comes with when it arrives at the warehouse. Typical values of product class are First Quality and Second Quality. Due to additional inventory processes within the warehouse, it is required to further classify inventory. Typical inventory status values are Normal, Awaiting Inventory Check, Inventory Held, etc.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description:
The segment type of the inventory. This helps to track inventory separately when the inventory is customized for a specific order so that the inventory can be allocated to that order.
When inventory is customized, it needs to be tracked separately. This field indicates the buyer or buyer category for who the inventory is customized.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The segment to which the inventory belongs. This helps to track inventory separately when the inventory is customized for a specific order so that the inventory can be allocated to that order.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: A date based inventory attribute that helps understand the order in which stock arrived at the node. This is used to send out items that arrived earlier than the ones that arrived later.
Attribute.Name: Fifo_No

Attribute.Description: The receipt header key that is associated with this LPN detail. This helps identify all stocks attached to a receipt. This number is of significance until the sample from the receipt has been certified as having passed or failed QC. This number is used to pull out all stocks based on the receipt.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The country in which the item was manufactured.
Attribute.Name: Country_Of_Origin

Attribute.Description: The date by which the item must be shipped so that it is usable. This is also referred to as the expiration date.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The number of units of the item available at this location.
Attribute.Name: Quantity

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Stores the LPN and its hierarchy.
Entity.Name: LPN_Hdr

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LPN_HDR table.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Hdr_Key

Attribute.Description: The receipt header key that is associated with this LPN header. This helps identify all stocks attached to a receipt. This number is of significance until the sample from the receipt has been certified as having passed or failed QC. This number is used to pull out all stocks based on the receipt. This is usually flled in situations where the LPN does not have contents.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The length of the LPN. This will be present only if the user has overridden the dimension at LPN creation, typically during receipts. Otherwise, the dimensions are picked up based on the standard packaging type for the item.
Attribute.Name: Length

Attribute.Description: The width of the LPN. This will be present only if the user has overridden the dimension at LPN creation, typically during receipts. Otherwise, the dimensions are picked up based on the standard packaging type for the item.
Attribute.Name: Width

Attribute.Description: The height of the LPN. This will be present only if the user has overridden the dimension at LPN creation, typically during receipts. Otherwise, the dimensions are picked up based on the standard packaging type for the item.
Attribute.Name: Height

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure in which the length, width, and height of the LPN are measured.
Attribute.Name: Dimension_Uom

Attribute.Description: The weight of the LPN. This will be present only if the user has overridden the weight at LPN creation, typically during receipts. Otherwise, the weight is picked up based on the standard packaging type for the item.
Attribute.Name: Weight

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure in which the weight of the LPN is measured.
Attribute.Name: Weight_Uom

Attribute.Description: A Case Id or Pallet Id. This field is a unique key of YFS_LPN_HDR table.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The LPN number of the immediate parent of this LPN.
Attribute.Name: Parent_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The outer most LPN number that is associated with this LPN detail. This is a unique key of YFS_LPN_HDR table.
Attribute.Name: Outer_Most_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The code of the organization to which the LPN belongs. This is usually filled in situations where the LPN does not have contents. Usually, if we know the items on the LPN, we know the organization to which it belongs.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The case quantity of the LPN. This will be present only if the user has overridden the case quantity at LPN creation, typically during receipts, because the case quantity is non-standard in this particular LPN. Otherwise, the case quantity is picked up based on the standard packaging type for the item. This attribute is of significance only when we are talking about single SKU pallet LPNs.
Attribute.Name: Case_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The type of the License Plate Number. For requests involving a license plate, this field is populated as Case or Pallet.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the complete LPN has been allocated to an operation.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allocated

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Is_Shipment_Assigned

Attribute.Description: The segment type of the inventory. This field indicates the buyer or buyer category for whom the inventory is customized.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The segment to which the inventory belongs. This helps to track inventory separately when the inventory is customized for a specific order so that the inventory can be allocated to that order.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: This flah indicates whether the LPN had variance detected during a Count operation. This drives whether the LPN can be allocated during Pick Location Assignment.
Attribute.Name: Freeze_On_Variance

Attribute.Description: A sequence number used to identify the transaction which is in progress for this LPN record.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Request_No

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the LPN is an Outbound Container.
Attribute.Name: Is_Outbound_Container

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Stores location of the LPN that directly sits on the location. In other words, it stores only the outermost LPN.
Entity.Name: LPN_Location

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LPN_LOCATION table.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Location_Key

Attribute.Description: The outer most LPN number that is associated with this LPN location.
Attribute.Name: Outer_Most_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The zone to which the location belongs. This, in conjunction with NODE_KEY, forms the unique key of the YFS_ZONE table.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the location. This, in conjunction with NODE_KEY, identifies a unique location in the node.
Attribute.Name: Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this LPN location.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Stores details about the LPN or part of the LPN that is on the move.
Entity.Name: LPN_Pend_Move

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LPN_PEND_MOVE table.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Pend_Move_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this LPN pending move.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the target location. This, in conjunction with NODE_KEY, identifies a unique location in the node.
Attribute.Name: Target_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The LPN detail key that is associated with this LPN pending move.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Dtl_Key

Attribute.Description: The LPN number that is associated with this LPN pending move.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The outer most LPN number that is associated with this LPN pending move.
Attribute.Name: Outer_Most_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The number of units of the item allocated from the LPN. This is applicable only if LPN_DTL_KEY is filled. Otherwise, it is assumed that the whole LPN is moving to the target location.
Attribute.Name: Alloc_Qty

Attribute.Description: The type of allocation. This indicates whetherthe item is HARD_ALLOCATED or SOFT_ALLOCATED.
Attribute.Name: Alloc_Type

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Non-license plated inventory is tracked using this table.
Entity.Name: Location_Inventory

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LOCATION_INVENTORY table.
Attribute.Name: Location_Inventory_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this location inventory.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The zone id that is associated with this location. This is the unique key attribute of the YFS_ZONE table in conjunction with NODE_KEY.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the location. This, in conjunction with NODE_KEY, identifies a unique location in the node.
Attribute.Name: Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The inventory item key that is associated with this location inventory. This points to a SKU that comprises the Inventory Organization, Item ID, Product Class and Unit of Measure.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: The inventory tag key that is associated with this location inventory. This points to lot and related attributes (revision etc) for the item whose inventory is tracked here.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: The inventory status that is associated with this location inventory. This refers to an inventory sub classification based on the results of the inventory control processes within the warehouse.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: The segment type of the inventory. This field indicates the buyer or buyer category for whom the inventory is customized.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The segment to which the inventory belongs. This helps to track inventory separately when the inventory is customized for a specific order so that the inventory can be allocated to that order.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: A date based inventory attribute that helps understand the order in which stock arrived at the node. This is used to send out items that arrived earlier than the ones that arrived later.
Attribute.Name: Fifo_No

Attribute.Description: The receipt header key that is associated with this LPN header. This helps identify all stocks attached to a receipt. This number is of significance until the sample from the receipt has been certified as having passed or failed QC. This number is used to pull out all stocks based on the receipt. This is usually flled in situations where the LPN does not have contents.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The country in which the item was manufactured.
Attribute.Name: Country_Of_Origin

Attribute.Description: The date by which the item must be shipped so that it is usable. This is also referred to as the expiration date.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The number of units of the item available at this location.
Attribute.Name: Quantity

Attribute.Description: The number of units of the item waiting to move into this location.
Attribute.Name: Pend_In_Qty

Attribute.Description: The number of units of this item waiting to move out of this location. This is typically done to service an order. This item will move out of this location for the specified purpose.
Attribute.Name: Hard_Alloc_Qty

Attribute.Description: The number of units of this item waiting to move out of this location. However, it is not necessary that it may move because soft allocations are typically suggestions made by the system for space optimization purposes or for operations within the warehouse not related to order shipments.
Attribute.Name: Soft_Alloc_Qty

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Assigned_Qty

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Stores audit information for every single location inventory transaction.
Entity.Name: Location_Inventory_Audit

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LOCN_INVENTORY_AUDIT table.
Attribute.Name: Locn_Inventory_Audit_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this location inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the location. This, in conjunction with NODE_KEY, identifies a unique location in the node.
Attribute.Name: LocationId

Attribute.Description: The outer most LPN number that is associated with this LPN location.
Attribute.Name: Outer_Most_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The type of the outermost License Plate Number. For requests involving a license plate, this field is populated as Case or Pallet.
Attribute.Name: Outer_Most_LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: The LPN number that is associated with this location inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The type of the License Plate Number. For requests involving a license plate, this field is populated as Case or Pallet.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: The inventory item key that is associated with this location inventory audit. This points to a SKU that comprises the Inventory Organization, Item ID, Product Class, and Unit of Measure.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: The inventory tag key that is associated with this location inventory audit. This points to the lot and related attributes (revision, etc.) for the item whose inventory is tracked here.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: The status in which inventory is sub-classified once it is received in the warehouse. For example, product class is a classification of inventory that the product comes with when it arrives at the warehouse. Typical values of product class are First Quality and Second Quality. Due to additional inventory processes within the warehouse, it is required to further classify inventory. Typical inventory status values are Normal, Awaiting Inventory Check, Inventory Held, etc.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: The segment type of the inventory. This field indicates the buyer or buyer category for whom the inventory is customized.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The segment to which the inventory belongs. This helps to track inventory separately when the inventory is customized for a specific order so that the inventory can be allocated to that order.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: A date based inventory attribute that helps understand the order in which stock arrived at the node. This is used to send out items that arrived earlier than the ones that arrived later.
Attribute.Name: Fifo_No

Attribute.Description: The receipt header key that is associated with this location inventory audit. This helps identify all stocks attached to a receipt. This number is of significance until the sample from the receipt has been certified as having passed or failed QC. This number is used to pull out all stocks based on the receipt. This is usually flled in situations where the LPN does not have contents.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The country in which the item was manufactured.
Attribute.Name: Country_Of_Origin

Attribute.Description: The date by which the item must be shipped so that it is usable. This is also referred to as the expiration date.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether it was a an addition to or a substraction of inventory.
Attribute.Name: Operation

Attribute.Description: The number of units of the item available at this location.
Attribute.Name: Quantity

Attribute.Description: The order # against which inventory transaction was made. This is a part of the unique key for the order.The Enterprise code and the order # together uniquely identify an order.
Attribute.Name: Order_No

Attribute.Description: The count request key that is associated with this location inventory audit. This specifies the count request against which the audit is written.
Attribute.Name: Count_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The release number. This is generated as a one up number against that release.
Attribute.Name: Release_No

Attribute.Description: The order line number. This is part of an order line's unique key.
Attribute.Name: Prime_Line_No

Attribute.Description: An audit reference indicating that this inventory transaction was for the batch number.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: The Bill of Lading number. An audit reference indicating that this inventory transaction was for a BOL is detailed here.
Attribute.Name: Bol_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment number against which the inventory transaction was performed.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment container number against which the inventory transaction was performed.
Attribute.Name: Container_No

Attribute.Description: The document type for the inventory transaction.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The inventory organization code.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: Generic references.
Attribute.Name: Reference_1

Attribute.Description: Generic references.
Attribute.Name: Reference_2

Attribute.Description: Generic references.
Attribute.Name: Reference_3

Attribute.Description: Generic references.
Attribute.Name: Reference_4

Attribute.Description: Generic references.
Attribute.Name: Reference_5

Attribute.Description: The reason for the inventory transaction. This field is typically populated when the user does an inventory adjustment. Inventory bins, which will be used to adjust inventory (for inventory synchronization) on the host systems, will be tied to this reason code.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The description of the reason for the inventory adjustment.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: The nature of the work (task type) that caused the inventory picture to be altered. Typical examples are RECEIPT, PUTAWAY, etc.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The serial of the inventory being modified.
Attribute.Name: Serial_No

Attribute.Description: The sequence number of the program creating the audit.
Attribute.Name: Sequence_No

Attribute.Description: The type of adjustment done for the inventory processed. Some of the possible values are like RECEIPT, RETURN, SHIPMENT and ADJUSTMENT.
Attribute.Name: Adjustment_Type

Attribute.Description: The work order key that is associated with this location inventory audit. This specifies the work order against which the audit is written.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: The wave number against which the inventory transaction was performed.
Attribute.Name: Wave_No

Entity.Description: Stores information for each alert raised.
Entity.Name: Locn_Monitor_Alert

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LOCN_MONITOR_ALERT table.
Attribute.Name: Locn_Monitor_Alert_Key

Attribute.Description: The location monitor rule key that is associated with this location monitor alert.
Attribute.Name: Locn_Monitor_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: The common code of the event that can be raised.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Id

Attribute.Description: The node to which the location belongs, for which the alert is raised.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifierfor the location. This, in conjunction with NODE_KEY, identifies a unique location in the node.
Attribute.Name: Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the item for which the alert is raised.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The enterprise to which the item belongs.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for which the alert is raised.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: Thr product class for which the alert is raised.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: The inventory status for which the alert is raised.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: The next timestamp beyond which the event can be re-checked.
Attribute.Name: Next_Alert_Ts

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LOCN_MONITOR_FILTER table.
Attribute.Name: Locn_Monitor_Filter_Key

Attribute.Description: The location monitor rule key that is associated with this location monitor filter.
Attribute.Name: Locn_Monitor_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: The zone being monitored. This, in conjunction with NODE_KEY, forms the unique key of the YFS_ZONE table.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The size code of the locations to be monitored.This, along with NODE_KEY, forms the unique key attribute of the YFS_LOCATION_SIZE_CODE table.
Attribute.Name: Location_Size_Code

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LOCN_MONITOR_RULE table.
Attribute.Name: Locn_Monitor_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this location monitor rule.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier for a rule within the node.
Attribute.Name: Rule_Id

Attribute.Description: The description of the monitor rule.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: The inventory consolidator for whom the rule is configured.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The common code of the event that can be raised.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Id

Attribute.Description: The flow to be invoked.
Attribute.Name: Flow_Key

Attribute.Description: The re-alert time.
Attribute.Name: Realert_Time_Interval

Attribute.Description: The r-alert time unit of measure.
Attribute.Name: Realert_Time_UOM

Attribute.Description: The value used to trigger the inventory monitor if the inventory at the location falls below the percentage of the location capacity defined.
Attribute.Name: Trigger_Percent

Attribute.Description: The product class of inventory to be monitored.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: The custom defined item classification definition. This allows for dynamically selecting a monitoring classification attribute of an item for defining location inventory monitoring constraints.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_1

Attribute.Description: The custom defined item classification definition. This allows for dynamically selecting a monitoring classification attribute of an item for defining location inventory monitoring constraints.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_2

Attribute.Description: The custom defined item classification definition. This allows for dynamically selecting a monitoring classification attribute of an item for defining location inventory monitoring constraints.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_3

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: The view formed by joining YFS_Lpn_Hdr,YFS_Lpn_dtl, YFS_Location_Inventory, YFS_Inventory_Item and YFS_LPN_LOCATION tables.
Entity.Name: NodeInventoryDtl_Vw

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_NODEINVENTORYDTL_VW view.
Attribute.Name: NodeInventoryDtl_Vw_Key

Attribute.Description: The inventory organization.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The item.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure of the item.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The product class of the item.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LPN_LOCATION table.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Location_Key

Attribute.Description: The node of the demand associates with the demand details.
Attribute.Name: Shipnode_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the zone.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the location. This, in conjunction with NODE_KEY, identifies a unique location in the node.
Attribute.Name: Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_LPN_HDR table.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Hdr_Key

Attribute.Description: The LPN number that is associated with this LPN detail.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The type of the License Plate Number. For requests involving a license plate, this field is populated as Case or Pallet.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: The LPN number of the immediate parent of this LPN.
Attribute.Name: Parent_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The outer most LPN number that is associated with this LPN detail.
Attribute.Name: Outer_Most_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The lpn dtl key .
Attribute.Name: Lpn_Dtl_Key

Attribute.Description: The inventory item associates with the demand details.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: The inventory tag key that is associated with this LPN detail.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: The status in which inventory is sub-classified once it is received in the warehouse. For example, product class is a classification of inventory that the product comes with when it arrives at the warehouse. Typical values of product class are First Quality and Second Quality. Due to additional inventory processes within the warehouse, it is required to further classify inventory. Typical inventory status values are Normal, Awaiting Inventory Check, Inventory Held, etc.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: The segment to which the inventory belongs. This helps to track inventory separately when the inventory is customized for a specific order so that the inventory can be allocated to that order.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description:
The segment type of the inventory. This helps to track inventory separately when the inventory is customized for a specific order so that the inventory can be allocated to that order.
When inventory is customized, it needs to be tracked separately. This field indicates the buyer or buyer category for who the inventory is customized.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The date by which the item must be shipped so that it is usable. This is also referred to as the expiration date.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The quantity of the demand details.
Attribute.Name: Quantity

Attribute.Description: The country in which the item was manufactured.
Attribute.Name: Country_Of_Origin

Attribute.Description: A date based inventory attribute that helps understand the order in which stock arrived at the node. This is used to send out items that arrived earlier than the ones that arrived later.
Attribute.Name: Fifo_No

Attribute.Description: The receipt header key that is associated with this LPN detail. This helps identify all stocks attached to a receipt. This number is of significance until the sample from the receipt has been certified as having passed or failed QC. This number is used to pull out all stocks based on the receipt.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: This flah indicates whether the LPN had variance detected during a Count operation. This drives whether the LPN can be allocated during Pick Location Assignment.
Attribute.Name: Freeze_On_Variance

Attribute.Description: The unique key or business key, which by itself identifies a receipt along with ReceivingNode.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_No

Attribute.Description: The date when the receipt was started.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Date

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the inventory is moved into the location. This is used for warehouses with certain number of locations. However, the usage of locations is phased out over a period of time.
Attribute.Name: Freeze_Move_In

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether inventory is moved out of the location.
Attribute.Name: Freeze_Move_Out

Attribute.Description: The number of units of the item waiting to move into this location.
Attribute.Name: Pend_In_Qty

Attribute.Description: The number of units of the item waiting to move into this location.
Attribute.Name: Pend_Out_Qty
